4302300.name: Empire Water Works
4302300.description:
• Faithful depiction of a 1920s-era steam-powered water pumping station

  • Operate and maintain a massive double-expansion steam engine from the bygone era

  • Interact with vintage machinery like boilers, water pumps and bilge pumps

  • Perform maintenance on equipment and order supplies such as coal and steam oil

  • Pump water to the town's residential, municipal and industrial water reservoirs, ensuring sufficient water pressure is maintained across the three reservoirs

  • Receive event-based 'contract' offers to supply reservoirs with a given amount of water and receive funding and reputation bonuses

  • Perform realistic 'cold and dark' startup procedures such as warming cylinder jackets and filling lubricators to ensure minimal wear on cylinder liners, main bearings and other components

  • Deal with critical events such as massive steam leaks, flooding and machinery damage including boiler explosions
4302300.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
